author: Reuters Editorial
title: Bolsonaro says coronavirus 'not all it's being made out to be'
description: Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro continued to downplay the coronavirus epidemic on Thursday, saying it is "not all it's being made out to be" and denying that any hospital in the country has reached its full capacity due to the outbreak.
content: BRASILIA (Reuters) - Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro continued to downplay the coronavirus epidemic on Thursday, saying it is “not all it’s being made out to be” and denying that any hospital in the country has reached its full capacity due to the outbreak… [+385 chars]
